jp.co.tanita.comm.ble

Class TNTUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.co.tanita.comm.ble.TNTUnit

  • public class TNTUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    The property class that represents a unit of measurement which the device can use.

    When the peripheral can use some units of measurement, it represents a summation value of the them which the device can use. cf. When a device can use kilo-gram(kg) and pound(lb) for measuring, this class has retain 3 (KILOGRAM + POUND).
